articles.title: World shocked by ‘crazy’ cricket massacre
articles.description: Indian bowler Mohammed Siraj engineered an extraordinary South African batting collapse as the hosts were bowled out for 55 before lunch on the first day of the second Test at Newlands on Wednesday.

articles.title: McIlroy open to LIV if it becomes 'IPL of golf'
articles.description: Rory McIlroy says he would be open to play in a tournament backed by LIV Golf if the controversial tour became more like cricket's Indian Premier League.
articles.content:
McIlroy was one of the strongest opponents when LIV was first announced but has since admitted it has brought some benefits
